author: scottbw
msg: Updated trunk to use 0.11.0 snapshot builds of parser and connector

author: mostarda
msg: Major improvement in NQuadsParser, added support for optional context. Done NQuadsParserTest refactorings. This commit is related to issue #ANY23-90.

author: steffkes
msg: SOLR-3238: Move License for d3.js & highlight.js

author: scottbw
msg: Fixed version of bash script to use for signing release artefacts.

author: arkurth
msg: Added check to Windows.pm::install_updates to return immediately if no updates were found on the management node to speed things up. It had been also retrieving list of updates installed on the computer which was pointless if nothing had to be installed.
